pages.about-us: About VivoDesign - Kindling Imagination and Enriching Living Experiences through Exceptional Home Designing Services VivoDesign HOME DESIGNING HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT VIVODESIGN - Home Design Experts EXPERIENCE INNOVATIVE DESIGN At VivoDesign, we specialize in creating exceptional home designs tailored to your lifestyle. Our team is committed to crafting spaces that inspire and enrich your daily living. From conceptualization to realization, let us bring your dream home to life with creativity and expertise. ABOUT US → CONVENIENTLY LOCATED VIVODESIGN HOME DESIGN STUDIO SBI Building, Old City, Lal Darwaja, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380001, India Consultation Hours Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM Saturday: By appointment only UNLEASH YOUR DESIGN POTENTIAL VIVODESIGN - Expert Home Design At VivoDesign, we believe in harnessing modern design practices combined with timeless aesthetics. Your home's design is our passion, and we customize our services to fulfill your unique vision for innovative and high-quality design. SUSTAINABLE STYLE IN DESIGN QUALITY AND CRAFTSMANSHIP Experience sustainable design with our dedication to using premium materials and collaborating with esteemed manufacturers in the design industry. We partner with trusted brands like Farrow & Ball, Kohler, Herman Miller, and Hunter Douglas, among others. The fusion of top-notch materials, expert craftsmanship, and our team's creativity forms the cornerstone of your successful design journey. pages.privacy-policy: VivoDesign Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information and Upholding Your Privacy Rights VivoDesign HOME DESIGNING HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT VivoDesign Privacy Policy Introduction This privacy policy ("Policy") describes how VivoDesign ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your Personal Information when you visit our website. Information We Collect We collect Personal Information that you provide to us when you fill out forms on our website, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us through email. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide. How We Use Your Information We use the Personal Information we collect for purposes such as responding to your inquiries, sending you updates about our services, and improving our website. Disclosure of Your Information We may share your Personal Information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing our services. We may also disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights. Changes to This Policy We may update this Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Policy, please contact us at vivodesign@gmail.com. The VivoDesign website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline VivoDesign About Us Services Contact Us TEL: +91-2611645422 Legal Notices Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
